game.name: Paracesium
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: PARACESIUM is a body horror time management game where you collect, analyze, dismember and reassemble body parts in order to create a pure cadaver for your experimentation. Every action takes time, so make your next decision carefully. Manage time, bodies and monsters and stay alive. Who is Delilah?
game.shortDescriptionEn: PARACESIUM is a body horror time management game where you collect, analyze, dismember and reassemble body parts in order to create a pure cadaver for your experimentation. Every action takes time, so make your next decision carefully. Manage time, bodies and monsters and stay alive. Who is Delilah?
